mapper.insert: insert into t_dept (id, parent_id, company_id, dept_name, create_time, dept_code, tel, fax, zip_code, address) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_dept set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zip_code = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, company_id, dept_name, create_time, dept_code, tel, fax, zip_code, address from t_dept where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, parent_id, company_id, dept_name, create_time, dept_code, tel, fax, zip_code, address from t_dept
